code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import projectContext from'../../context/projects/projectContext';import taskContext from'../../context/tasks/taskContext';var Project=function Project(_ref){var project=_ref.project;var projectsContext=useContext(projectContext);var getActualProject=projectsContext.getActualProject;var tasksContext=useContext(taskContext);var getProjectTasks=tasksContext.getProjectTasks;var getProject=function getProject(id){getActualProject(id);getProjectTasks(id);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-blank",onClick:function onClick(){return getProject(project._id);}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"centrar"},project.name));};export default Project;
